title: No search results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog in the IDE, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works as expected.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. When searching for declarations, this fully qualified name is not found.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the search functionality should first try to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name and not the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the IDE
2. Go to the Package view
3. Select a package
4. Right-click and choose the 'Search' option
5. In the Search dialog, enter a search query for declarations
6. Click on the 'Search' button
7. Note that no results are displayed

Expected Behavior:
- When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, the search functionality should display the search results correctly for declarations.
